header.div: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You should write at least 150 words.

p.b: Your local newspaper published a series of articles recently which you thought were very good.
Write a letter to the editor of the newspaper. Thank them for the articles and praise the journalist who wrote them. Ask if they will be publishing more of their articles in the future.

div.p: You do NOT need to write your own address.
Begin your letter as follows: Dear Sir/Madam,
